channel.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
channel.description:
Hey guys, thought I'd make my own quick version of the trailer theme. It's by no means brilliant but I'll try to improve it when I get some more time. :slight_smile:
[URL='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lug1SdXI7so '][b][u]Youtube - 'It's Been A Long Time' Cover (Extended)[/u][/b][/URL] [b][u][COLOR='Lime'](MP3 in Youtube Description)[/u][/b])
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uw9IYAnOoWg'][b][u]Youtube - 'It's Been A Long Time' Cover[/u][/b][/url] [b][u][COLOR='lime'](MP3 in Youtube Description)[/u][/b]
Made entirely from scratch in [b]Reason 5[/b]. I also edited the actual trailer footage a bit to make it more cinematic. :wink:
Thanks,
[b]Harry[/b].

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
The extended version without the echo really sounds like some computing science. Though I like the first extended version better because the echo fits with the depth in the testchambers of Aperture Science shown in the video. Nice work!

Read full topic
item.source: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
Harry-UK:

Hey guys; here’s a slightly different version with no echoes or effects added to it.

The start sounds like an awesome dubstep song intro.

I like both of them though

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: Ding
item.description:
Just my opinion, I like the echo as it gives it a little depth, and it doesn’t sound over the top or added as an afterthought. I agree with the others in this thread, you definately have awesome talent.

Read full topic

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: Harry-UK
item.description:
Hey guys; here’s a slightly different version with no echoes or effects added to it.

Which do you prefer?

I want as much feedback as possible so that I can improve it and remaster it very soon.

Thanks,

Harry.

Read full topic
item.source: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: doomyshadowsquirrels
item.description:
Harry, I must add that your 5th Let’s Play Portal video was absolutely charming. The Space Odyssey theme has never been more fitting ^^

Read full topic

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Harry-UK:

Oh? Which parts were they? Do you mean the mechanical noises and stuff? If so, I was going for a more ‘melodic’ or musical theme for my version.

Pretty much, yeah. (That & the cute turret ‘whoa’ sound.)

Read full topic
item.source: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: Smat
item.description:
Nice!

Considering the amount of time you put into it I think it’s excellent work. I also like how you cut the video.

Keep it up and one day you’ll have a desk at Valve HQ ^_^!

Read full topic

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: Harry-UK
item.description:
Thanks for the constructive criticism Wombât, although I made the drums slightly muffled and quieter on purpose because I didn’t want them to overpower everything else. I feel that they’re still too prominent actually; the original Valve track has barely noticeable drums.

Read full topic
item.source: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: Wombat
item.description:
The melodic parts sound good but you should work more on the drums, the kick and snare sound a bit muffled. The overall mastering could also be better. Otherwise, a pretty good job, the atmosphere really feels like portal.

Read full topic
item.source: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version

item.source: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: Harry-UK
item.description:
Maverix26:

It really ties well with the trailer as the video progresses, did you do that on purpose, or was that luck?

Thanks guys! Maverix26, I timed it all so it fitted.

Dias:

It’s OK, but you pretty much took out the parts of the song that I actually thought made it interesting to listen to.

Oh? Which parts were they? Do you mean the mechanical noises and stuff? If so, I was going for a more ‘melodic’ or musical theme for my version.

Here’s an Improved and Extended Version.

Thanks,

Harry.

Read full topic

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: doomyshadowsquirrels
item.description:
Harry-UK:

Nope; I’m currently still at school (sixth-form - I’m 18 ). I do these things just for fun at the moment. I’m hoping to go University next year and study Film & TV Production; should allow me to utilise my various video, musical and 3D-effects skills.

Sweet ^^ Mark my words, someday your talents will make employers froth at their mouths. (they might have already…)

Read full topic
item.source: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version

item.title: 'It's Been A Long Time' - My Version
item.dc:creator: Harry-UK
item.description:
OrderOfDagon:

Sounds like Deus Ex. Which literally makes the track awesome.

Woah, thanks! Deus Ex is one of my all-time favourites; I’m honoured.

doomyshadowsquirrels:

What do you do anyway? You 3D model and compose for anyone in particular? :3

Nope; I’m currently still at school (sixth-form - I’m 18 ). I do these things just for fun at the moment. I’m hoping to go University next year and study Film & TV Production; should allow me to utilise my various video, musical and 3D-effects skills.

Read full topic
